## Homepage

Welcome to my blog ! This blog was created for my English my Data Science courses. It is divided in multiple sections :

- **Breast Cancer** : articles on Breast Cancer.
- **Data Science 1** : for my Data Science course
- **English for Science** : for the analyzes of my articles and my English Activity Log (M.E.A.L) 
- **M.E.A.L** : things I did during the week, the month.

I hope you have a good time !
